alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 5:38AM EST until February 18 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Eagle Creek At Phalanx Station affecting Trumbull County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Tuscarawas River At Massillon affecting Stark County. Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. Mahoning River At Leavittsburg affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. For the Tuscarawas River...including Massillon...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Site Specific Non-forecast Pt...including Phalanx Station... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscarawas River At Massillon. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding begins in the Agathon Park area to Route 21. Water encroaches on Route 62 in Navarre. Flood waters may force the closing of two railroad crossings in Massillon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM EST Friday was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 16.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 315 PM EST.
